scripts.lint: oxlint && NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx/esm' eslint . && cargo clippy --workspace --all-features --all-targets -- -D warnings
scripts.fmt: chore . && oxfmt --write . && dprint fmt && cargo fmt --all
scripts.build:ts:p1: pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-injector' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-injector-native' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-engine' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-client' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-cli' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-i18n' build
scripts.build:ts:p3: pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-hono' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-bun' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-node' build && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-tanstack-router' build
scripts.build:ts: pnpm build:ts:p1 && pnpm build:ts:p2 && pnpm build:ts:p3
scripts.test:ts: pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-injector' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-server' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-injector-native' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-hono' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-bun' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-adapter-node' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-client' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-react' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-tanstack-router' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/eslint-plugin-seam' test && pnpm --filter '@canmi/seam-i18n' test
scripts.test:integration: cd tests/integration && go test -v -count=1 && cd ../fullstack && go test -v -count=1 && cd ../i18n && go test -v -count=1 && cd ../workspace-integration && go test -v -count=1 -timeout 120s
scripts.test:e2e: cd tests/e2e && pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:integration && pnpm test:e2e
